data.description: Sprint 17 was at 75% when we pivoted to EPIC-got-db. Remaining work: 1 task. Context: We needed schema evolution and orphan management before continuing feature work.

properties.retrospective: Sprint 17 (SparkSLM) is already 100% complete with all 4 tasks done. No remaining work to pivot back to.

data.title: PIVOT: Return to Sprint 17 SparkSLM after GoT-DB foundation complete
